name: ontime
tagline: A self-hosted time tracking and reporting tool
description: Ontime is a self-hosted time tracking and visualization tool. It logs work sessions, generates reports, and provides a simple UI for freelancers or small teams to manage time and productivity.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Generate summaries of hours worked by period, project, or team member for billing and analysis

features.title: Timer Interface
features.description: Start and stop timers with one click to capture time as you work without manual

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download time reports as CSV or PDF for invoicing, payroll, or client reporting

features.title: Team Tracking
features.description: Monitor time logged by multiple users for project management and capacity planning
